column2: title=<small>Bloomsbury Auctions: Modern First Editions, English & Continental Literature & History, Emblem Books, Economics & Law 13 March 2008</small>

column1: '''''Bloomsbury Auctions: Modern First Editions, English & Continental Literature & History, Emblem Books, Economics & Law 13 March 2008''''' is an auction catalogue from Bloomsbury Auctions (London). The description for Lot 156 includes quotes from a letter from [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] to Ingrid Pridgeon (cf. "[[Letter to Ingrid Pridgeon]]"). The second page of the letter is reproduced in a photograph.<ref>{{webcite
column4: articlename=Addenda and Corrigenda to ''The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide'' (2006) Vol. 1: Chronology
